basics.name: Robert Sasak
basics.label: Professional life enjoyer
basics.summary: Robert originally comes from Slovakia. He has earned degrees from the Charles University in Prague and University of Bergen, Norway. He has a strong theoretical background in planning problems and computational complexity theory. At the same time, he is very passionate about web development. Robert moved away from backend to solely frontend development. However, NodeJS still covers his back.

work.summary: Norgeskart is the most detailed map of Norway. App is available for both iOS and Android.
Sparebanken Vest is Norway 3rd biggest bank with strong focus on digital services.
StormGeo is leading weather forecasting company providing weather forecast for both end users and private companies.
highlights: Migrate project from ASP.NET to single page appplication using AngularJS.
Cross platforms solution: desktop, mobile web, iOS app, Android app, Windows 8 App.
Optimization of the app for high volume traffic.

work.summary: Knowit (Reaktor) is one of the leading consultancy firms in the Nordic region.
highlights: Developing customized website for clients with high demands using Umbraco framework.
Responsive Web, Android app, iOS app

volunteer.summary: Command line in the cloud. Build with NodeJS, Docker.
Tool for web developers that allows synchronized browsing across desktop, mobile, Android, iOS and Windows devices.
Several map solutions build with NodeJS, PhoneGap, WebGL, ReactNative.
highlights: Top 10 app in App Store (Navigation, Norway)

education.institution: Charles University in Prague, Czech republic
